text: The India national futsal team is India's team for international futsal competitions. The All India Football Federation (AIFF) controls the team. The team is governed in Asia by the Asian Football Confederation (AFC). India's first game was against Bahrain in an international friendly game on 12 August 2023. The 2024 AFC Futsal Asian Cup qualification was their first international competition.
